altername_name: Iron Clads: The Game Of Surface Naval Combat 1901-1945
name: Iron Clads
overview: Iron Clads: The Game Of Surface Naval Combat 1901-1945 is a freeware, 2 player, turned based strategy wargame created by Ashley Sear in Hisoft Basic and released on February 8, 1992 and placed on public domain May 16, 1992. The purpose of the game is to simulate surface naval warfare in the early part of the 20th century, ending with the conclusion of World War II.
